segments.text: Hello , Professor , this is Kalina , and I am in your literature class on Monday mornings .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was partying hard over the weekend , fell down the stairs , and need time to recuperate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds painful . Are you going to be OK ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I sprained my wrist , but the doctor says it will be fine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many days will you be out of school ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The doctor said I should be good enough to return next week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am glad you let me know that you will be missing class . Get well !
segments.speaker: S2
